程序包 com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.Unit.UpdatableUnit.Creature

类 Boss

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.World.GameObject
com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.Unit.UpdatableUnit.UpdatableObject

com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.Unit.UpdatableUnit.Creature.Boss
所有已实现的接口:
Alive, Updatable
public class Boss extends Enemy
The com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.Unit.UpdatableUnit.Creature.Boss is a special Enemy.

It could not be bubbled, and should be shot several times to die. After it die, it will generate a star to let the hero become invincible for a while.

另请参阅:
BossCollide

      rowNum - indicates the unit vertical coordination
